hCalendar 10a - extracting contact without using hCard test

This page was design to test the extracting of contact information from hCalendar without using hCard.

From: hCalendar test suite 1.0

Author: Lawrence Woodman

Tests:

Test Result Comment
vevent[0].contact IsEqualTo("Dr John Peter Doe") The contact is an optional singular value and can be a string
